heading: HR00473
0: A RESOLUTION URGING THE COMMITTEES ON GOVERNMENT REORGANIZATION, HOUSING & URBAN DEVELOPMENT, AND METRO MANILA DEVELOPMENT TO CREATE, AUTHORIZE, AND EMPOWER A GOVERNMENT INSTITUTION THAT WILL STUDY, REGULATE AND IMPLEMENT A HARMONIZED, COMPREHENSIVE URBAN PLANNING IN METRO MANILA
